action.mouse_action: The user is not interacting with the mouse, but the email is in the process of sending.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client. The user is sending an email to reschedule a meeting. The email is addressed to kta.yasuda@gmail.com from Fujitsu <fujitsu.fujitsuxxx@gmail.com>. The subject of the email is "Rescheduling Meeting". The body of the email reads, "Hi, Can we reschedule our meeting one hour later, from 2024-11-17 16:00~17:00 to 17:00~18:00? Thank you, Fujitsu".
